main.com.tec.MILIB_DB.service

Class MilibRestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.com.tec.MILIB_DB.service.MilibRestService

  • public class MilibRestService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements the Web Service for the MILIB project for the DATABASE This Web Service run on Port 8080

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response BACK()
      Make rollback of all changes made to the database url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/back
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response COMMIT()
      Make commit of all changes made to the database url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/commit
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response DELETE(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      Method responsible for removing an image from the disk given its metadata url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/delete
      private java.lang.String inputToString(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      Converts the received inputStream to a String for handling the received JSON file
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response INSERT(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      It is responsible for inserting new images in the RAID and in the metadata Database url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/insert
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response SELECT(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      Method in charge of returning a JSON with the requested image from the client, under the criterion of the parameters of the metadata url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/select
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response UPDATE(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      Update the metadata of an image or several images url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/update

      • SELECT

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response SELECT(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
                                 throws org.json.JSONException
        Method in charge of returning a JSON with the requested image from the client, under the criterion of the parameters of the metadata url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_Servidor_war_exploded/api/database/select
        Parameters:
        incomingData - Receive a json with the information of the requested image
        Returns:

      • DELETE

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response DELETE(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
                                 throws org.json.JSONException

        Returns:
